name: Hammer and Anvil
flavor: "Let's not argue about who's the hammer and who's the anvil!"

metadata.flavor: "Let's not argue about who's the hammer and who's the anvil!"

effects.tier1: 5 + M damage; one ally within 10 squares of you can use a strike signature ability against the target as a free triggered action
effects.tier2: 9 + M damage; one ally within 10 squares of you can use a strike signature ability that gains an edge against the target as a free triggered action
effects.tier3: 12 + M damage; two allies within 10 squares of you can each use a strike signature ability that gains an edge against the target as a free triggered action

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: If the target is reduced to 0 Stamina before one or both chosen allies has made their strike, the ally or allies can pick a different target.
